content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on adjusting Section 306 Pension awards based on changes in net worth, including
developing for net worth in Section 306 Pension cases
criteria for excessive net worth
discontinuance of Section 306 Pension
, and
handling an $80,000 estate when net worth is not a bar
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
